content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "grass_block", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 9, "index": 19}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 15, "index": 30}, {"type": "suspicious_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 38}]
thought: To craft light_gray_terracotta, I first need to craft light_gray_dye. I can do this by using the oxeye_daisy in slot 37.
Ok
act: move from slot 37 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "grass_block", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 9, "index": 19}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 15, "index": 30}, {"type": "suspicious_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 38}]
thought: I have crafted the light_gray_dye, so I now need to move it to an inventory slot to make space in the crafting grid for the terracotta.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "grass_block", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 9, "index": 19}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 15, "index": 30}, {"type": "suspicious_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 38}]

thought: To craft light_gray_terracotta, I need to place 8 terracotta blocks around a light_gray_dye block. The first terracotta block will be placed in the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1), since the light_gray_dye block is already in my inventory (slot 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "grass_block", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "infested_cracked_stone_bricks", "quantity": 9, "index": 19}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 15, "index": 30}, {"type": "suspicious_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 7, "index": 38}]
thought: I have placed the first terracotta block in the top left corner of the crafting grid, so now I need to place the second terracotta block to its right in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 2 with quantity 1
